fact.description: The match is underway at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in for Russia at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in Russia.
Algeria to take a throw-in in Russia territory.
The match is underway again.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Sofiane Feghouli.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Algeria throw-in in Russia's half.
Dmitry Kombarov with an assist there.
Sofiane Feghouli has recovered and rejoins the match in Curitiba.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Algeria.
Algeria are coming forward and Nabil Bentaleb gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Russia goal kick.
Can Russia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?
Ball safe as Russia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Algeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Algeria to take a throw-in in Russia territory.
Can Algeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Throw-in for Algeria in their own half.
Free kick Russia.
Free kick Russia.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a throw-in for Russia, close to Algeria's area.
Russia's Aleksander Kokorin misses with an attempt on goal.
Algeria have a goal kick.
In Curitiba Russia's Aleksandr Kerzhakov is caught offside.
Throw-in for Algeria in their own half.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Algeria.
Goal kick for Russia at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in for Russia at Arena da Baixada.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Russia throw-in in Algeria's half.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Russia.
Important block from the Algeria defence as Dmitry Kombarov fires in a strike for Russia.
Free kick Russia.
Russia's Oleg Shatov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Cuneyt Cakir awards Algeria a goal kick.
Algeria's Djamel Mesbah gets in a shot on goal at Arena da Baixada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Algeria's Abdelmoumene Djabou gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Russia defender.
Corner awarded to Algeria.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Algeria in their own half.
Algeria's Aissa Mandi has run offside.
Cuneyt Cakir awards Russia a goal kick.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Russia.
Algeria to take a throw-in in Russia territory.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Russia throw-in in Algeria's half.
Algeria drive forward and Yacine Brahimi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Abdelmoumene Djabou for Algeria is whistled offside.
Algeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Algeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Russia.
Can Russia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?
Goal kick for Algeria at Arena da Baixada.
Djamel Mesbah (Algeria) has received a first yellow card.
Russia to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
Algeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Algeria.
Can Algeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Algeria have been awarded a corner by Cuneyt Cakir.
Islam Slimani of Algeria smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Algeria in their own half.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Algeria.
Algeria are pushing forward but Esseid Belkalem's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Russia goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Algeria throw-in in Russia's half.
Throw-in Russia.
Cuneyt Cakir will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the first half.
Russia's Aleksandr Kerzhakov is on target but unsuccessful.
Russia make their first substitution with Igor Denisov replacing Denis Glushakov.
Russia push forward through Alexander Samedov, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick Algeria.
Corner awarded to Algeria.
Algeria have a dangerous throw-in.
In Curitiba, Aleksandr Kerzhakov of Russia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Russia have been awarded a corner by Cuneyt Cakir.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Algeria in their own half.
Russia to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
Cuneyt Cakir blows against Russia's Aleksandr Kerzhakov for offside.
Free kick Algeria.
Dmitry Kombarov (Russia) has received a yellow card from Cuneyt Cakir.
Russia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Algeria!
Russia's Aleksei Kozlov has been booked in Curitiba.
Yacine Brahimi instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Russia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Russia throw-in in Algeria's half.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Russia.
Algeria have a goal kick.
Can Russia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?
Russia have been awarded a corner by Cuneyt Cakir.
Russia's Aleksander Kokorin is whistled for offside at Arena da Baixada.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Russia throw-in in Algeria's half.
Fabio Capello is making the team's second substitution at Arena da Baixada with Alan Dzagoev replacing Oleg Shatov.
Russia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Russia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Russia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Algeria's half?
In Curitiba Russia drive forward through Aleksandr Kerzhakov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Russia to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
Hassan Yebda is on a sub for Yacine Brahimi for Algeria.
Russia to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
Throw-in for Russia close to the penalty box.
Russia needs to be cautious. Algeria have an attacking throw-in.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Russia in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Curitiba to check on Islam Slimani, who is grimacing with pain.
Play has been resumed at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in for Russia close to the penalty box.
Algeria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Russia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nabil Ghilas is on a sub for Abdelmoumene Djabou for Algeria.
Throw-in for Russia at Arena da Baixada.
Ball goes out of play for a Algeria goal kick.
Fabio Capello (Russia) is making a third substitution, with Maxim Kanunnikov replacing Aleksandr Kerzhakov.
Throw-in for Algeria at Arena da Baixada.
Can Russia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?
Corner awarded to Russia.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a Russia throw-in in Algeria's half.
Algeria have a goal kick.
Islam Slimani returns to the field for Algeria after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick Russia.
Nabil Ghilas (Algeria) gets a yellow card.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Russia in their own half.
Ball safe as Algeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Russia.
Russia's Aleksei Kozlov breaks free at Arena da Baixada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Cuneyt Cakir awards Algeria a goal kick.
Algeria make their third substitution with El Arabi Soudani replacing Islam Slimani.
Russia to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the second half.
Throw-in Russia.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a throw-in for Russia, close to Algeria's area.
Liassine Cadamuro Bentaiba (Algeria) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
Cuneyt Cakir signals a free kick to Algeria.
Russia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
